input.sentences: the children loved the independence day celebrations . they loved the trains that were part of the parade .
the characters were from the [male] the tank engine tv series .
some of them had mickey mouse on them .
but it was the [male] the tank engine characters that really stole the show .
my son received a flag themed hat and would n't stop wearing it for the rest of the day .
output.sentences: There was a special parade for kids who loved trains.
It was themed around the thomas the tank engine series.
Mickey mouse made a special appearance in one of the trains.
A man stole one of the children from out of a train.
The stolen child was wearing a stop sign themed costume.
